about_the_game:
Introducing a brand-new experience that continues the legendary legacy of the competitive gaming world! Offering both FPS and TPS perspectives, it promises players an experience filled with fast-paced map battles, realistic weapon mechanics, and team-focused strategies.

Players will test both their individual skills and teamwork as they compete across various maps. The realistic weapon mechanics make every shot and move feel significant, while the fast-paced gameplay delivers adrenaline-fueled moments.

What it offers:

  • Fast-paced gameplay: Dynamic map battles and exciting matches shaped by split-second decisions.

  • Realistic weapon mechanics: An experience with unique behavior for each weapon and realistic physical laws.

  • Team-focused strategy: Work together with teammates, develop strategies, and defeat opponents.

  • Varied maps: Maps that require different tactics to master and explore.

Designed as the result of a quest for competitive gaming enthusiasts. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, this game will encourage you to try more and win every match. Form your team, create strategies, and embrace victory!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains violence, blood, and the use of weapons, with players attempting to kill each other. It is an online multiplayer game with voice chat and other interactive elements. However, there is no sexual content, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or sexual assault themes in the game.

name: Subdimension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Requires processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Requires processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 11 64bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A new experience that carries on the legendary legacy of competitive gaming! Dive into fast-paced map battles, realistic weapon mechanics, and team strategies. Work together, dominate opponents, and feel the ultimate thrill of victory!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Polish*, Hungarian*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Czech*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
